detail_desc: Scarf in a soft, pleated weave.
Set with a top and shorts. Jersey top with a print motif and short sleeves. Shorts in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and back pockets.
Knitted jumper in a wool blend with wide raglan sleeves that taper at the cuffs.
Short, off-the-shoulder dress in woven fabric with side support and silicone trim at the top. Seam at the waist, pleated skirt and concealed zip at the back. Lined at the top.
All-in-one pyjamas in organic cotton jersey with a rounded collar, chest pocket and press-studs down the front, at the crotch and down the insides of the legs.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and rounded hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.

Calf-length cold shoulder dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-shaped opening with ties at the top and frill-trimmed cut-out sections at the shoulders. Long sleeves with smocked cuffs, a smocked seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Smocking at the top, tie-top shoulder straps, a rounded hem and slits in the sides. Unlined.

Shirt in crisp premium cotton poplin with a full spread collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Body in lace and mesh with underwired, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a string back and lined gusset with press-studs. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sleeveless top in satin with wide, tie-top shoulder straps and a V-neck front and back.
Short, A-line dress in an airy weave with tiny smocking and a V-shaped opening with ties at the neckline. Short, wide raglan sleeves, and a gathered seam at the hem for added width.

prod_name: NATE  basic S/S solid tee BB
detail_desc: T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.

Straight-cut coat in a merino wool and cashmere blend with notch lapels and buttons down the front. Yoke at the back, wide sleeves with an adjustable tab at the cuffs, and welt front pockets. Unlined.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a visible seam centre back, long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
V-neck T-shirts in cotton jersey. Slim fit.
Elasticated fabric scrunchie.
Cropped vest top in stretch, ribbed cotton jersey in a narrow cut at the top with a racer back.

Short dress in airy plumeti chiffon with a wide drawstring neckline and long raglan sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Partly lined in jersey.

Set with a sports top and short tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Straight-cut top with short dolman sleeves, a print motif on the front and rounded hem. Longer at the back. Tights with a panel at the waist.
Wide T-shirt in soft, marled jersey made from a viscose and cotton blend in a relaxed fit with cut-off, raw-edge sleeves.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined, drawstring hood and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Large chest pocket with a zip, and a drawstring at the hem.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Calf-length dress in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, long raglan sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and short slits in the sides.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with an appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Short, wide blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, gathers at the shoulders, short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Trims down the side seams and around the hem.

Short, sleeveless dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist with a flounce, a concealed zip in the side and a flounce at the hem. Lined front and skirt.
Knee-length, pattern-weave skirt with a concealed zip at the back and decorative buttons.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton slub jersey with a button placket and open chest pocket.

Cold shoulder blouse in an airy, patterned weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and small stand-up collar. Cut-out sections at the shoulders with elastication and a frill trim, and long sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs.

Long-sleeved shirt in washed Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short, gently fitted dungaree dress in stretch denim with buttons down the front, wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a seam at the waist with patch pockets. Unlined.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons at the front and jetted front pockets. Lined.
Long-sleeved blouse in a softly draping weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Slightly wider sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline and gently dropped shoulders.

Nylon bomber jacket with an appliqué on the chest and one sleeve, a stand-up collar and zip down the front. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket, an open inner pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.

Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with a small opening and button at the cuffs, a lace-trimmed seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt.
Joggers in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, concealed pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Microfibre Brazilian briefs with laser-cut edges, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a collar, button placket and small embroidery detail on the chest. Straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Relaxed-fit joggers in stretch cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. Elasticated drawstring waist, a fake fly, side pockets and jetted back pockets. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbing at the hems.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and a wrapover, jersey-lined funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey.
Joggers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.

Maxi dress in a jacquard-weave Tencel™ lyocell and viscose blend. Narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck opening front and back, and ties at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist with a decorative tie detail at the front, and a softly draping skirt with a high slit at the front. Unlined.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a collar, V-neck, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Airy chiffon blouse with 3/4-length sleeves and flounced cuffs. Partly lined.

Double-breasted pea coat in a felted wool blend containing some cashmere. Detachable pile collar, peak lapels and buttons down the front. Welt side pockets, two inner pockets, one with a button, and sleeves with an adjustable tab and button at the cuffs. Lined.

Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a gathered, elasticated neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length sleeves with elasticated cuffs, a seam at the waist and an A-line skirt. Unlined.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and heart-shaped press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud and buttoned cuffs.
Fitted jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a long sleeves, a polo neck with a roll edge at the top, and roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Short top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with long sleeves.
Short, cable-knit jumper in a soft wool blend with long raglan sleeves and decorative pompoms at the front and down the sleeves. Wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted dress in velour with a V-neck and long sleeves.
T-shirt in soft cotton with contrasting colour panels along the shoulders and sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with a print motif and sequins on the front, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in a softly draping weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Boxer shorts in stretch, fast-drying, breathable, functional fabric with wide elastication at the waist and slightly longer legs.

Long, oversized coat in woven fabric with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Large flap patch pockets at the front, a concealed drawstring and detachable tie belt at the waist and a high slit at the back. Unlined.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in soft, heavily draping viscose jersey with spaghetti shoulder straps and a wrapover V-neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
High-waisted, ankle-length trousers in stretch jersey with concealed elastication at the waist, a visible zip at the back and slim legs.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and elastic hem.
Double-breasted jacket woven in a viscose blend with notch lapels, buttons at the front and jetted front pockets. Lined.

prod_name: Kim HW satin Pull- on trs
detail_desc: Ankle-length trousers in satin crêpe with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets and elasticated hems.
Short skirt in a cotton weave with double-layered flounces, the lower layer with an embroidered flower pattern and the top layer with a pompom trim. High waist with wide smocking.

Maxi dress in soft jersey with a V-neck at the front and low-cut neckline at the back. Wide shoulder straps that cross at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist and a long, pleated, heavily draping skirt. Lined.
Running vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. Seamless.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with a small fabric appliqué at the top, an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and low crotch. Zipped side pockets, a welt back pocket with a concealed press-stud and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Bomber jacket in woven fabric with reversible sequin appliqués, a small, ribbed stand-up collar and a zip down the front. Welt side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved hoodie in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front, double-layered hood and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Cardigan in a loose, chunky-knit cotton blend with a V-neck, buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders and wide, tapered sleeves.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Ankle-length trousers in a viscose weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist and tie belt. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, patch front pockets and tapered legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a foldover shaft. (Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.) The socks are made partly from organic cotton.
